sentences.english: I said I have read my horoscope.
sentences.chinese: 我看过了我的星座运程。

sentences.english: I did my--I got my horoscope for today on the web.
sentences.chinese: 我今天在网上看了自己的星座运程。

sentences.english: Many fortune-tellers claim that they can tell your fortune(s) in the coming year.
sentences.chinese: 很多算命先生声称可预告你在新一年的运程。

sentences.english: I read my horoscope every morning, but I don't really believe in it.
sentences.chinese: 我每天早上都看我的运程，但其实我不信它。

sentences.english: Let me tell you how about golden boar's nature and prospect.
sentences.chinese: 让我给大家讲一讲金猪年的运程与性格。

definition: birth year as designated by animal symbols (mouse, ox, tiger etc)
luck with the ladies/a romance/good luck
colloquial term for 生肖[sheng1 xiao4] the animals associated with the years of a 12-year cycle
the character 8 or 八/birthdate characters used in fortune-telling
one of the twelve animals symbolic of the earthly branches 地支[di4 zhi1]/animal from the Chinese zodiac
Tai Sui, God of the year/archaic name for the planet Jupiter 木星[Mu4 xing1]/nickname for sb who is the most powerful in an area
Mandate of Heaven/the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC/usually written 大運河|大运河[Da4 Yun4 he2]
